title: Maxwell Ltd: Finder of Lost Loves Pilot
Goodbye, Sara
description: Cary tries to find a man's granddaughter. He finds her and learns she's a drunk. Cary doesn't bring her to her grandfather. Instead he takes care of her. Daisy airs her concern but he ignores her.

title: Undying Love
description: A man who was wrongfully and illegally imprisoned seeks his wife. And Daisy finds her but she's remarried. And Cary is asked by a man to locate a girl whom he sees everyday but is too shy to approach.

roles.char: Elinor Sweeney, one of Johnny's clients

title: Portraits
description: A man wants to find the woman in a painting. When he meets her he doesn't seem to make a connection with her. And a woman fears that her ex-husband has kidnapped her son and asks Cary to find him.

title: A Gift
description: A student dancer who has been receiving financial assistance from an anonymous donor tries to find out who it is. When the man is discovered he wants to remain anonymous but her boyfriend who wants her to quit dancing so that she could be his trophy wife claims that it's him and convinces her to quit, he has to decide to come forward. And a woman wants to find a woman whom she claims is an old friend but the woman claims she doesn't know her. She admits that she's the birth mother of the woman's daughter and wants to see her because she is dying.

title: Forgotten Melodies
description: Cary helps a man suffering from amnesia find out who he is. He discovers that the man has a wife in Arizona whom he brings to and is happy to see him it seems he has been missing for four years. When Cary returns to L.A. a woman asks him to find her husband who's missing and when she shows him his photograph it's the same man he just brought to Arizona. It seems he sustained amnesia four years ago. Daisy helps a man who was the business manager for a famous singer whom she believes has fallen on hard times.

title: Deadly Silence
description: A man hires Cary to look for his daughter. When he finds her and tells her her father is looking for her she doesn't believe it. But when she sees him he pulls a gun but Cary helps her escape. And a woman asks Daisy to find the man she met a few months ago while on vacation and they hit it off. And when they agree to leave together and meet at the airport, he doesn't show up. She wants to find him.

title: Mister Wonderful
description: A man whose involved with a younger feeling that he can't give her what she wants asks Cary to locate her ex. And when he does the guy is not exactly a good guy. And a guy Daisy dated asks her to find his girlfriend. But after meeting her, he realizes he still has feelings for Daisy.

title: Connections
description: A man seeks the foster family who took him in when his parents died. But because he left under less than amicable circumstances, they don't welcome him back. He then decides to take his brother whom he left with him who's still with them. But his foster father tells a secret that might make that unlikely. And a man who is talking to an old woman seeks her out. But she turns out to be a young woman.
